tool_description: These APIs provide data of cryptocurrencies market, ideal for tracking your personal asset profit.
title: Crypto Tracking

api_list.name: New Tracking
api_list.description:
**Request** :

specify 

> coin 

> quantity 

> funding 

for create **encode** data.

**Option** :

if you have old tracking. send it in parameter name ***encode*** for update new tracking list.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com/tracking"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.put(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Delete Tracking
api_list.description:
Delete your tracking by specific the coin. 
send **coin** you want to delete in body with current **encode**. 
After success you will receive new **encode**.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com/tracking"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.delete(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Edit Tracking
api_list.description:
edit your tracking.
you can edit **quantity** and **funding** by specific the **coin** , and send it in body with current **encode**.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com/tracking"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.patch(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tracking
api_list.description: This Apis for using **encode** from api put /tracking to see live data of profit , price , growth rate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com/tracking"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Coins listed
api_list.description:
Get list of coins supported on this APis.
 The source of price from binance for now.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com/coins"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com/tracking"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com"
